Play.Header: DET wins toss, elects to Receive, and NE elects to defend the North goal.

Play.PlayDescription: (14:50) (Shotgun) 10-C.Batch pass to 86-D.Sloan to NE 14 for 59 yards (24-T.Law). Sloan broke a tackle from Malloy at the New England 40 yard line. New England's Ty Law was shaken up on the play.
